Intel.PLSP_MA_short_0: %s has been assigned a short-term study program.
Intel.PLSP_MA_des_0: Officer have been assigned to %s for short-term training, which will still last for about %s days.
Intel.PLSP_MA_ends_1: %s has completed their studies and returned to your command.
Intel.PLSP_MA_des_1: Your assigned officer successfully returned from the North Celestial Akademia to your fleet. After a comprehensive reassessment of their skills, you are sure that their journey has been fruitful and that you can fully develop their previously accumulated potential.
Intel.PLSP_MA_des_2: The chaos on %s has affected the normal operation of the Akademia. In order to avoid possible losses, you recalled your attending officers back right before unexpected event occurred.

HullMod.PLSP_starlightadapterTEXT1: Every capacitor that more than vent increases weapon range by %s .
HullMod.PLSP_starlightadapterTEXT4: %s capacitors have been converted to flux vents.
HullMod.PLSP_flashboosterTEXT2: the Supercharger will gradually increase rate of fire for all weapons by %s.
HullMod.PLSP_flashboosterTEXT3: Beam damage will increase gradually by %s.
HullMod.PLSP_flashboosterTEXT4: Benefit ratio as per weapon sizes: %s/%s/%s
HullMod.PLSP_flashboosterTEXT5: When ceasing fire, the benefits from the Supercharger will gradually dissipate.
HullMod.PLSP_solarscopeTEXT1: Friendly ships with %s installed increased %s/%s/%s/%s shipsystem cooldown rate
HullMod.PLSP_clustermodulatorTEXT1: Forms a flux energy network with other ships with the %s installed within %s distance,
HullMod.PLSP_clustermodulatorTEXT2: with two ships at a time automatically transmitting soft flux and synchronizing flux levels.
HullMod.PLSP_clustermodulatorTEXT3: The transmission rate is the lesser of the dissipation rates of both ships.
HullMod.PLSP_clustermodulatorTEXT4: Every %s transmissions imposes extra %s/%s shield/other damage taken.
HullMod.PLSP_clustermodulatorTEXT5: Every %s transmissions imposes extra %s other damage taken.
HullMod.PLSP_clustermodulatorTEXT6: Ships that are overloaded or venting cannot access the network
HullMod.PLSP_clustermodulatorTEXT7: Ships that have reached their peak time cannot access the network
HullMod.PLSP_clusteradditionTEXT1: Adds an additional transmission channel for the %s
HullMod.PLSP_clusteradditionTEXT2: Maximum range of this additional transmission channel is %s
HullMod.PLSP_clusteradditionTEXT3: The flux transfer rate of this additional transmission channel is half of the original.
HullMod.PLSP_fluxlinkTEXT1: All flux generated by fighters can be transferred to the ship in real time,
HullMod.PLSP_fluxlinkTEXT2: but transfer stops when the ship overloads, venting or exceed %s flux capacity.
HullMod.PLSP_fluxlinkTEXT3: Ship cannot vent when transfer is active.
HullMod.PLSP_hardenedsafetyTEXT2: Weapon range past %s units increased by %s
HullMod.PLSP_hardenedsafetyTEXT3: Damage caused by source distance %s to %s is reduced by %s at most
HullMod.PLSP_hardenedsafetyTEXT4: Max speed reduced by %s/%s/%s/%s, while zero-flux boost increased its half
HullMod.PLSP_hardenedsafetyTEXT5: When ship is overload, spawn mote per %s/%s/%s/%s second
HullMod.PLSP_nodelockTEXT1: Immediately occupy a Capture Point within your own occupation range, even if it is under enemy control
HullMod.PLSP_nodelockTEXT2: Unless there are other enemy ships with this hullmod in the vicinity of the point
HullMod.PLSP_heiTEXT1: Ordnance Point cost of Large Energy Mounts are reduced by %s
HullMod.PLSP_commissionTEXT1: Forms a command network with other ships that can be used within a distance of %s.
HullMod.PLSP_commissionTEXT2: Ships in the same network will have the range of their weapons increased.
HullMod.PLSP_commissionTEXT3: The closer ships are, the greater the range increase, providing %s/%s/%s/%s for each hull size respectively
HullMod.PLSP_commissionTEXT4: Maximum range bonus granted through the Low-Entropy Channel is %s.

ShipSystem.PLSP_timedisturbanceS1: Reducing the timeflow of nearby enemy ships
ShipSystem.PLSP_energycondenserS1: Increasing Rate of Fire of energy weapons by
ShipSystem.PLSP_energycondenserS2: Reducing energy weapon flux generation by
ShipSystem.PLSP_repairlinkS1: Repairing structure and armor of all fighters over time
ShipSystem.PLSP_repairlinkS2: Reducing flux of all fighters over time
ShipSystem.PLSP_reservedroneS2: Fighters must be ordered to attack
ShipSystem.PLSP_shellareaS3: Reducing damage to self's shields by
ShipSystem.PLSP_solarwindS1: Hindering the movement of enemy units over a wide area

Misc.PLSP_imMod: Not compatible with a mod on launch
Misc.PLSP_mission1C: Take advantage of the enemy's mobility weakness.
Misc.PLSP_mission2D: At least 50% of our ships must evacuate.
Misc.PLSP_mission4A: The Battlecruiser under the command of Scyathea
Misc.PLSP_mission4C: Turn the opponent's quantitative advantage into qualitative disadvantage.
Misc.PLSP_spotresilience: At the start of battle, temporarily gain a unlearned skill at random.
Misc.PLSP_alphacoreRC: Reduces maintenance by %s. Reduces demand by %s units.
Misc.PLSP_alphacoreAD: Other colonies of the faction will also receive a slight increase.

CMD.PLSP_normalexperience_tooltip:
The road from proficiency to mastery never ends, but naval doctrine lesson plans do.
Increase officer experience and gain appropriate combat skills.
CMD.PLSP_normalexperience_des: At the end of normal, the officer will gain %s experience.
CMD.PLSP_spotexperience_tooltip:
Reality always comes in harsher than theory, but knowing what have to do is always more important than most things.
Officer will learn a special skill that will enable them to adapt to complex environments in battlefield.
CMD.PLSP_spotexperience_des: At the end of normal, the officer will learn special skill "Spot Resilience"
CMD.PLSP_spotexperience_des2: In addition to credits, an additional Alpha Core is required as cost.
